name: 5 Trials
description:
Do you dare face the beasts of the 5 Trials?

There's an island that's not too far off the coast. 

An old town legend says that this island holds the 5 Trials.

Each trial is a terrifying beast that must be defeated to progress.

It is said whoever defeats the Trials will be granted a wish.

But is this island really what it appears to be?

Face the 5 Trials and find out!

------------------------------------------------------------

5 Trials is a short 2D action game which is based around boss battles.

The gameplay is very simple. You only have sword to attack the bosses, and you must dodge their attacks by moving.

This has been a hobby project I've been working on in my spare time to challenge myself and learn new creative skills.

I hope you enjoy it!
